channel.title: How come my server panel says

item.title: How come my server panel says
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

okay so i have this in my client.java:

 public void writePlayers() {
    int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
       
  clock();//time at the top of the screen, i would put it in the server panel, but it doesn't work
		
			
        
		//server panel (Panel in the top right corner)
		//Left hand side
		sendQuest("Owners: Runegay", 15895);
		sendQuest("Stroodle, Fruitcake", 15897);
		sendQuest("Players Online: "+players, 15898);
		sendQuest("forums: land-scape.tk", 15899);
	
		
		

				setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
  
  }

and it has this:
